<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> which hath an <S%G5220>husband<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> to her <S%G435>husband<s%> so long as he <S%G2198>liveth<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> be <S%G599>dead<s%>, she is <S%G2673>loosed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of her <S%G435>husband<s%>.
